attributes.action: stop making new laws that are pointless and enforce the ones we already have
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The time has come for the prime minister to realise that the existing laws of this country are not being adhered to .We need more trained and visible police officers acting to prevent crime instead of outrageously high levels of surveillance filming people openly flouting the law and wrecking british society.Cameras do not apprehend stolen cars or prevent innocent people being assaulted or prevent vandalism ,littering and intimidation.Policemen and women do!
Passing more and more useless laws is pointless tubthumping,effective implementation of existing legislation is good sense.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
